pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Variable Reduction Using Principal Component Analysis // PCA done by eigenvalue decomposition of a data correlation matrix, here it automatically determines the number of factors by eigenvalue greater than 1 and it gives the uncorrelated variables based on the rotated component scores, Such that in each principal component variable which has the high variance are selected. It will be useful for non-statisticians in selection of variables. For more information, see the http://www.ijcem.org/papers032013/ijcem_032013_06.pdf web page.
